short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: PromptGPT is a Chrome extension that lets you share your ChatGPT conversations with one click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
PromptGPT lets you share your ChatGPT conversations with one click from your OpenAI chat screen. Simply click the 'Share' button next to the input box to get your shareable link.

PromptGPT shared conversations are publicly available and can be browsed on our website.
